Class Coordinate

  • java.lang.Object
    • Coordinate

  • public final class Coordinate
extends java.lang.Object
    Coordinate is a representation of a point in the plane

      • scale

        public Coordinate scale(int width,
                        int height)
        converts a point representing a relative, fractional location into an absolute term This assumes 0 <= x, y <= 1
        Parameters:
        width - how many pixels wide the region is
        height - how many pixels high the region is
        Returns:
        a version of the point scaled to a larger region
